story_27_62000/2401_1001_0100_10: No! Why is he so strong?! What is this power?
story_27_62000/2401_1001_0200_10: Omigosh, Lear! You toootally crushed it!
story_27_62000/2401_1001_0400_10: So this is the power of sync stones...
story_27_62000/2401_1001_0500_10: Or rather...the bond between me and Hoopa!
story_27_62000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Th-this isn’t over yet! We have more who can
fight! We’ll crush you to—
story_27_62000/2401_1001_0700_10: Unfortunately, you’re the only one left.
story_27_62000/2401_1001_0800_10:
We’ve gone ahead and taken care of the other
members of Team Break that were here at 
this hideout.
story_27_62000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Wha—?! That’s impossible! There were so many
of us!
story_27_62000/2401_1001_1000_10:
No matter how strong a Pokémon may be, if the
bond between it and its Trainer is weak, it won’t
be able to reach its full potential.
story_27_62000/2401_1001_1100_10: It’s time for you to surrender.
story_27_62000/2401_1001_1400_10: A champion came to help us?
story_27_62000/2401_1001_1600_10: I asked for some help so we could save Hoopa...
story_27_62000/2401_1001_1700_10:
You were counting on me. There’s no way I could
let us fail.
story_27_62000/2401_1001_1900_10:
I have something important to tell you all.
Follow me.
